content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for it?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. I believe that [500] Euro per month would be a reasonable amount. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but I'm looking for a higher price. How about [600] Euro per month? Do you think that's acceptable?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, [600] Euro per month is a bit more than I had in mind. Would you be willing to lower the price to [550] Euro per month? I believe that would be a fair compromise.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but [550] Euro per month is still not enough for me. How about [575] Euro per month? This is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, [575] Euro per month is closer to my budget, but I was hoping for something a bit lower. Would you consider [560] Euro per month? This would be very helpful for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but [560] Euro per month is not acceptable to me. I need at least [575] Euro per month to rent out this apartment. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort. However, [575] Euro per month is more than I can afford right now. I'm sorry, but I'll have to look for other options. Thank you for your consideration. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
